entries.meaning: (Australia, New Zealand) A type of cake, similar to the French financier, but with the addition of fruits or other flavourings; commonly eaten with coffee.
examples: I lug my stuff out to the ute and drive out of this lovely surburb with its old trees and young caf√©s, espresso and friands, poodles and BMWs.

entries.meaning: A sausage roll, eaten in France.
